Flights.Name: Flights
Flights.Description: Your team members will be able to see their flight details, airport information and booking references.

Accommodation.Name: Accommodation Information
Accommodation.Description: Your team members will be able to see key information about their hotel stay, including check-ins and room types.

HireCars.Name: Hire Cars
HireCars.Description: You can display all the information needed to collect and run a hire car, with pre-allocated drivers and passengers.

Activities.Name: Activities
Activities.Description: You can display all the information needed to collect and run a hire car, with pre-allocated drivers and passengers.
